title: [WBFS][NTSC] Resident Evil Archives - RE [RE4E08]
description:
Description: 

Wii game
NTSC region/version (USA, America, etc)

Resident Evil Archives: Resident Evil

game id: RE4E08
format: wbfs, converted with WiiBackupManager
source: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5318250/Resident_Evil_Archives_-_Resident_Evil_%28Wii%29_%28NTSC%29 (a lot of rars containing a single 4.3+GB iso)

No hassle! Just download and use your favourite loader! It can also be converted back to iso and burned into a DVD, but you'll have to google a little for those instructions.

A Backstory:
A while ago I didn't even have a wii but I noticed during a research that the NTSC version of this game was a bit(or a lot?) hard to find in a peer-to-peer network, yes, since I didn't have a stable or reliable internet connection I was inclined to use a torrent client. 
So I decided to upload the thing, albeit in a rar'd way in many parts. And to be honest I wasn't sure it would work, but it did. I was an anonymous dude back then, but I wanted to give something back to the piratebay community. I kept seeding it until it got seeds, then I had to delete it from my harddrive (it was a small one).
Now I have a stable connection of my own and a bigger harddrive so I converted the original iso(had to download it back first, thanks to you seeders out there) to wbfs format to eliminate the hassle that many, so many people had to do these years. 
Sorry to be anonymous back then, but now you know why.
Cheers.
